Keywords: Cosmic , Excalibur , Mystical , Ruler
Real Name: Opal Luna Saturnyne
Special Powers
THE CARD IS DRAWN...THE CORPS REBORN: FREE: Generate a Captain Britain Corps bystander in a square within 6 squares and line of fire [MAX 3].
LONG MAY SHE REIGN: Mastermind. When Saturnyne uses it, she may instead choose a friendly character with "Captain Britain" in their name within 6 squares.
DRAGONFIRE: Penetrating/Psychic Blast, Improved Targeting: Character, Adjacent. // RANGE: Choose an opposing character within range and along a direct line of fire. Make a range attack targeting that character and all other characters occupying squares along that line of fire. Instead of normal damage, each hit character is dealt Saturnyne's printed damage value.
OMNIVERSAL MAJESTRIX: Leadership, Perplex. // Once per turn, you may reroll a die rolled by a character within range (including one die of an attack roll).

Comments
July 4, 2022
heyodern
Another subtle plus for this character is her reach of 13 squares with that running shot. So far one of the Magnetos has a 12 reach, and a half dozen pieces have 11s. She'll be controlling more of the board than any other piece if you see her in sealed play.
June 24, 2022
bam
I like this character & dial... She & Q at 30 points with an army behind them could be devestating.
June 22, 2022
Redrover454
There's so much to unpack here it's almost not worth leaving a comment. The FREE bystanders + the 6 square, no LOF required Mastermind combo is absurd. Huge damage potential with her attack special and an 8 Range. Lastly, she can do something no one else in Modern can do: reroll any single D6 in any situation, no restrictions. Yes, it's that simple. Regen, Willpower, or even Felix Faust's trait if you wanted. The whole package for only 150 points is incredible!
